channel.title: WNBA basketball on Digital Forays
channel.description: Recent content in WNBA basketball on Digital Forays

item.title: WNBA Historical Stats
item.description: Yay! The WNBA season is upon us and already started! Since I had recently done some analysis on the NBA Playoffs—I figured I would goof around and play with the WNBA a little bit. In service of that, let’s dive in. So, as always, we start with data gathering. I tried using the fabulous nba_api to grab data, but for years closer to the creation of the league (1997), things seemed a little spotty to me.
